entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
